sub_title: Certified Life Coach, Career Coach, Budget Coach and Business start-up Coach, passionate & equipped to coach your personal and business development journey.

profile_positions.description: KidsCare Kenya (https://kidscare.or.ke) believes that every child has the right to a build on their future and develop the talents they have been born with. Therefore, together with our specialized partners, and in line with government policies we are dedicated to ensure that this basic right is achieved. Our HomeCare programs support and coaches families with orphans, abused children, teenage mothers and children with special abilities be it mental or physical. Our service centre is located in Mshiu, LungaLunga Sub-County. The service center is a unique facility in its area and enables us to offer a wide range of services to the neighborhood, a unique concept in the Sub-County. Earnings of the facility are used for our child supporting programs.
profile_positions.title: Advisor Audits, Project Management and Organisational design KidsCare Kenya

profile_positions.description: Certified Life Coach, Career Coach, Budget Coach and Business startup Coach. Passionate about coaching people, teams and businesses towards enhanced fulfilment and ongoing sustainable growth through GeckoView’s holistic coaching approach. We leverage a broad spectrum of international experience ranging from personal balance, psychology to competence and skill to team, leadership and business excellence. As co-founder Frans leads the GeckoView Business Development branch.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director Personal and Business Development

profile_positions.description: Volunteering to actively support the HOPE Foundation charity organisation to achieve its wonderful humanitarian objectives, with a focus on enhancing the organisational efficiency. Please check out the Hope Foundation Linked-In company page as well as our website to experience how we enhance refugees quality and outlook of life through initiatives involving culture and the arts.
profile_positions.title: Chairman of the board HOPE Foundation
Special Studies Shell Int Exploration and Production

profile_positions.description:
Accountable for the Asset Integrity, Process Safety and Reliability/Availability of the QGC LNG plant at Curtis Island delivered through capable, competent and motivated engineering discipline and reliability teams and staff using state of the art integrated business processes and innovative tools.
People: Management of change transitioning from ex Bechtel project and British Gas to Shell processes, tools and culture; including accountabilities, development plans, subject matter experts, technical authorities and network connections.
Processes: Asset lead for the transition to Shell Asset Management System, high grading implementation of change based on the short and long term business targets and aspirations derived from benchmarking, business diagnostics. Orchestrated and sponsored post-project vulnerability reviews in all disciplines to create targeted discipline plans. Also developed a formal Digitalization and Innovation program, developed greenhouse gas improvement strategies and sponsored major associated projects, including Battery and Solar spinning reserve and Demolition and Rehabilitation planning. 
Tools: Managed a fit for purpose transition to Shell tools, with a focus on smart predictive and preventative tools.
profile_positions.title: Engineering Manager QCLNG

profile_positions.location: Shell India Martkets Pvt Ltd, Bangalore, India
profile_positions.description:
Account Manager accountable for the Integrated Gas technical service agreements with Joint Ventures, Non-Shell operated ventures and mega projects in Australia and Indonesia, including Arrow, Woodside, Browse, Prelude, INPEX-Abadi, Gorgon, QCLNG and QGC. Worked with asset field- and management teams to create intimate trust relationships to enable strategic business improvement diagnostics and delivery. This involved influencing the independent (Non Shell) operators in areas of Compliance (License to Operate), Performance (LNG & upstream benchmarking to metrics to Gap to Potential closure), LNG-Upstream integration, Project to Asset transition, rejuvenation and emergency response support. 
Lead negotiator on major new Service Agreements and amendments of a number of existing agreements. Set up agreements and rationalized value-add Shell support to BG Australia assets.  Developed a deep understanding of Joint Venture management, strategic positioning, budget planning, Legal, Tax, Commercial models, licensing, IP management, Governance roles and relationships in multicultural contexts. 
Lead the creation of the Integrated Gas Production Academy, including delivery of the Front Line Barrier Management (operations and maintenance) competence framework. Further grew personal Shell and industry networks, asset networks (operations, engineering and plant managers) and grew detailed business understanding of Marine, LNG and Upstream businesses. Mentored a large number of staff, lead the global Service Management Excellence team and delivered many (process safety) Integrity Leadership workshops.
profile_positions.title: Manager Integrated Gas Services

profile_positions.description: Technical Authority (TA1) for Production Operations and Maintenance, Turnaround, Reliability & Integrity. Accountable for Production Operations business improvement and compliance in project and operate phase, managing specialised teams on Production Operations, Operations Readiness, Emergency Response, Flawless, Ensure Safe Production, Operations Integrity, Process Safety, Integrity Leadership, Reliability, Maintenance and Turnarounds. Sponsored and lead major diagnostics and business improvement programs, assurance reviews and health checks at Shell Operated, Non-Operated and strategic third party assets and projects, including Petronas, MLNG, PTT, Reliance, Santos, BLNG, Woodside, Sakhalin-LNG and Shell operated ventures in the East.
profile_positions.title: General Manager Operational Excellence Asia Pacific

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the implementation of the Shell LNG Production Excellence program Gas-GAME at all (non Shell operated) LNG assets in APAC. Supported sites with program and change management, as well as implementation guidance.
profile_positions.title: Production Excellence Manager LNG East

profile_positions.description: Accountable for the global delivery of the Shell CUI standard. Developed project teams at all 36 DS-M sites with a budget totalling over 1.2 billion US$. Coached and steered CUI project managers to create significant formal project structures supported by site leadership. Actively managed the many stakeholders involved from leadership to field, including contractor crews. Provided full project assurance to all site projects in line with formal Shell project processes. Actively brokered information between sites and regions and developed practical guidance documents allowing all project teams to progress safer, faster and more cost efficiently. Field implementation involved changing many fixed paradigms in existing maintenance processes.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager Global Corrosion Under Insulation Downstream

profile_positions.description: Created and implemented global standards for Asset Master Planning to ensure best return on investment (money and effort) of CAPEX and OPEX proposals, vis a vis the Downstream portfolio. Coached 12 assets and safeguarded global consistency to use more holistic long term project views and to improve project front end loading. Linked project investment proposals with group strategy and regional and site business objectives and premises, driving novel ‘Produce the Limit’ workshops. Actively supported sites to manage projects proposals through Investment Committees and budget processes. Managed the global team of AMPs during the last year.
profile_positions.title: Asset Master Planner Europe & Africa

profile_positions.description: Member of Shell Europe production management team, responsible for improvement and harmonization of Integrity Management processes at 12 refinery and chemical assets. This involved course corrections at many sites often impacting on the site’s relationship with their local legislators and asset improvement plans agreed with asset managers.
profile_positions.title: Integrity Services Manager Shell Europe

profile_positions.description: Global team lead of the first global Downstream Equipment Integrity team to harmonize work processes and supporting tools, through active participation and consultation of zonal leads and their discipline leaders. Accountable for integrated delivery with other Operations and Engineering work processes.
profile_positions.title: Global Lead Equipment Integrity Excellence Downstream & Manager Integrity Stanlow

profile_positions.location: Stanlow Refinery and Chemicals, United Kingdom
profile_positions.description: Managed the integrity department, off-plot pipeline maintenance and site Integrity & Reliability initiatives. Part of mega TA leadership. Developed and implemented site wide Risk and Reliability Management and SAP projects. Developed and negotiated major site-wide incentivised contracts. Participated in a major Due Diligence.
profile_positions.title: Manager Inspection and Integrity

profile_positions.location: Shell & BP Refinery, Durban, South Africa
profile_positions.description: Accountable for maintenance and reliability of half the refinery. Deputy Production unit manager, leading the mechanical and instrumentation field crew. Implemented maintenance planning and quality system and a reliability improvement program. Crisis leader during many unplanned unit shutdowns and a series of industrial disputes (incl strikes). Leader (hands-on) and manager (manage leaders) of major turnarounds. Project manager on multiple projects and a reconstruction project of a burned down HF Alkylation unit. Developed, negotiated and awarded major long term site-wide partnering contracts (Mechanical Services & Workshop and NDT).
profile_positions.title: Maintenance Engineer

profile_positions.location: Shell & BP Refinery, Durban, South Africa
profile_positions.description: Reorganized the Inspection department and developed and implemented an externally accredited quality system, including a site Risk Based Inspection system. Lead support to multiple asset events (Maintenance, Turnarounds, and emergencies) on site, the terminal and marine facilities. Selected and implemented an Inspection and maintenance Management IT system. Influenced the development of new South African Inspection legislation.
profile_positions.title: Inspection Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the development of Pernis Risk Based Inspection strategy and support on all materials and corrosion issues at the Pernis Chemical plants.
profile_positions.title: Materials and Corrosion Engineer

profile_positions.description: Accountable for a multi-industry sponsored PhD Corrosion Science project, leading to my PhD.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Student
